msContents.summary:
I) Säʿatat za-lelit wa-za-nägh “Horologium for the Night and the Morning Hours” (fols. 3r-56r) I-1) Introductory prayers and hymns (fols. 3r-14r) - Halle luya… ʾaʿattǝb wa-ʾǝtnäśśaʿ ba-sǝmä ʾab… “Hallelujah… I make the sign of the cross and stand up in the name of the Father…” (Introductory prayer) (fols. 3r-4v) - Gǝnäyu la-ʾǝgziʾabǝḥer… “Serve the Lord…” (Hymn to God) (fols. 4v-5v) - Rǝḫuqä mäʾat… “Far from anger…” (Prayer) (fols. 5v-6v) - ʾƎweddǝsäkki ʾo-dǝngǝl… “I praise You, o Virgin…” (Hymn to St. Mary) (fols. 6v-7r) - Täzäkkär ʾǝgziʾo kidanä… “Remember, O Lord, the covenant…” (Hymn to the Lord) (fols. 7r-8r) - Nǝʿi ḫabeyä ʾo-dǝngǝl… “Come to me, O Virgin…” (Hymn to St. Mary) (fols. 8r-9v) - Nǝsebb[ǝḥo] la-ʾǝgziʾabǝḥer… “We praise the Lord…” (Praise of God) (fols. 9v-11r) - Gänäynä la-ki ʾo-wälättä Dāwit… “We have served You, O daughter of Dāwit…” (Hymn to St. Mary) (fols. 11r-11v) - Sǝʾalu la-nä… “Pray for us…” (Hymn to the saints and angels) (fols. 11v-14r). I-2) Readings (fols. 14r-17r) - for Monday (fols. 14r-16v) - for Sunday (fols. 16v-17r) I-3) Principal prayers and hymns (fols. 17r-56r) - Kwǝllomu śärawitä mälaʾǝkt mänfäsawǝyan… “All hosts of the spiritual angels… ” (Hymn to God) (fols. 17r-19v) - Mogäs wa-kǝbrǝnä qärnä mädḫanitǝnä... “Grace and our glory, the horn of our salvation…” (Hymn to the Trinity) (fols. 19v-25v) - Sälam la-ki Māryām la-Noḫ ḥa[mä]ru… “Salutation to You Mary, Noah’s Ark… ” (Hymn to St. Mary) (fols. 25v-30v) - Täfäśśǝḥi Māryām Fasika la-ʾAddam… “Rejoice, Mary, Adam’s Easter…” (fols. 30v-36r) - Täʿabbǝyo näfsǝyä la-ʾǝgziʾabǝḥer. Säʾali la-nä Māryām… “My soul extolls God. Pray for us Mary…” (Prayer to St. Mary) (fols. 36r-41r) - Säʾal la-nä Giyorgis näʿa näʿa näʿa näʿa Giyorgis… “Pray for us George; come, come, come, come George… ” (Hymn to the saints, angels, etc.) (fols. 41r-44v) - Mäḥarännä ʾAb. Hale luya. Täśahalännä Wald. Hale luya Mänfäs Qǝddus… “Have compassion upon us, Father. Hallelujah. Have mercy upon us, Son. Hallelujah Holy Spirit…” (Prayer to the Trinity) (fols. 44v-45v) - Täśahalkä ʾǝgziʿo… “You had mercy, o Lord…” (Prayer to God) (fols. 45v-46v) - Täfäśśǝḥi ʾo-Māryām mǝlǝʾtä ṣägga… “Rejoice, o Mary, full of grace…” (Hymn to St. Mary) (fols. 46v-47r) - ʾO-rǝḫrǝḫtä ḥǝllina… “O tender-hearted...” (Hymn to St. Mary) (fols. 47r-48r) - Sälam la-sǝʾlǝki za-yǝʾeddǝm la-nǝṣṣare… “Salutation to Your icon which is pleasant to the sight…” (Greeting to the Icon of the Virgin Mary) (fols. 48r-50v) - Hale luya nǝsgǝd la-ʾabä bǝrhānāt… “Hallelujah, let us worship the Lord of the lights...” (fols. 50v-53r) - ʾƎsebbǝḥ ṣäggaki ʾo-mǝlǝʾtä ṣägga... “I praise Your grace, o full of grace…” (Hymn to St. Mary) (fols. 53r-54v) - Kwǝllomu śärawitä mälaʿǝktä mänfäsawǝyan… “All hosts of the spiritual angels…” (Hymn to St. Mary) (fols. 55r-56r)
Additiones 1-3.

msItem.note: - About the text “Maṣḥafa Säʿatat” and the different versions, cp. EAE V,501-503. The text in Ms.QMM-003seems to belong to the category described as S.2.
- The text is very similar to Ms.MR-027.
- The Ms. contains most of the prayers and hymns of the edition Maṣḥafa Säʿatat, ba-gǝˤǝzǝnna ba-ʾamarǝñña. Za-lelit wa-za-nägh, Addis Abäba 1952 A.M. [1960 A.D.].
A similar text is contained in Ms. EMML 2096, fols.84r-125v.

list.item: f. 1v: Hymn to St. Mary.f. 1v: [እ]ሴብህ፡ ጸጋኪ፡… f. 1v: I praise Your grace... Hymn from the “Säʿatat”. Written in a recent hand (in dark crimson ink), incomplete.
f. 2r: Hymn to St. Mary.f. 2r: ተፈሲሒ፡ ማርያም፡… f. 2r: Rejoice, Mary... Hymn from the “Säʿatat”. Crudely written in pencil, incomplete.

f. 2v: Hymn to St. Mary.f. 2v: ኩሎሙ፡ ሠራዊተ፡ መላእክት፡ መንፈሳውያን፡… f. 2v: All hosts of the spiritual angels… Written in a recent hand, incomplete. The same hymn has been started to be written on fol. 2r (above Additio 2).

- The word ድንግል፡ (“Virgin”) is written (in black ink, by the scribe) in the upper margin of fol. 47v; the word በከመ፡ (“Like, as”) is written upside down (in black ink, by the scribe) in the bottom margin of fol. 48v. - Several names are written in red ink in the same hand as the main text on fol. 56r, at the end of the text: [ወለ]ተ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ [ገብ]ረ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ወልደ፡ ማርያም።, [Wälä]ttä Takla Hāymānot, [G]äbrä Takla Hāymānot, Walda Māryām. - A note mentioning the title ውእቱ፡ ሰአታት፡ ዘቤተ፡ ክርስትያን፡ “This is the Hours of the church”, and a personal name in Latin script, Kahsay, are written (recently; in pencil) on fol. 57r. - The title of the work (ሠአታት) is written in pen in the upper margin of fol. 1r. - A simple black line is used as text divider on fols. 50v and 56r. - Corrections (words or letters) are written interlineally and in the margins: fols. 14v, 54v. - Immediate corrections indicated by thin lines above and below the word: fols. 5r, 48r. - Erasures: fols. 8r, 10r. - Crude minor notes: fols. 1r, 19v, 20v, 22r, 23r, 25v, 26r, 29r, 30v, 33v, 34r, 57v. - Crude drawing on fol. 1r.
